about.title: get to know louby lou
body: Heya! Lucy here, AKA Louby Lou! the North West’s #1 female clown!

For 25 years I’ve been spreading giggles, Joy and Fun all around the North West! The best part of being a clown is being able to witness smiling parents, giggling children and above all sharing and creating memories that will last a lifetime! Since the ripe old age of 6, I’ve been developing my skills within the entertainment business, following in my father's footsteps, perfecting the recipe for the perfect celebration!

It starts with a base of good old-fashioned clown skills, laced with a generous dose of modern Ibiza dance tunes and a dash of the unexpected! A true recipe for Excitement! And who knows, maybe one of my 3 wonderful girls will carry the Louby Lou Legacy!

top.title: 25 years of giggles fun and joy

bottom.title: This is just a test
text: Keep this quite short, maybe a tagline?

cards.title: Check out my events
description: What are Louby Lou events, you say? Well, they're a typical Louby Lou show held at a venue near you!
Picture it, a lovely venue, you, your little ones, music, food, drink and an unmatched giggly energy!

cards.title: It's party time
description: We all know the little ones deserve a party like no other.
Book louby lou for a range of events, such as Birthday parties, School events, Christenings & Weddings, Hospitals and much more!
